text: Akshat is an American voting rights lawyer and politician who is the United States shadow senator from the District of Columbia. He was elected in 2024. Akshat is the first Asian and Indian-American to be elected official in D.C. history. ==References== Category:Living people Category:United States Shadow senators from District of Columbia Category:Democratic Party (United States) politicians Category:Lawyers from Washington, D.C.
title: Ankit Jain
